reg_info.act_under: Reopening Ontario (A Flexible Response to COVID-19) Act, 2020

content.content: 1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1. O. Reg. 385/20, s. 3. Schedule 1   ENFORCEMENT OF ORDERS
content.raw_html:
1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1. O. Reg. 385/20, s. 3.

Schedule 1
ENFORCEMENT OF ORDERS

content.content: 1. (1) A police officer or any other provincial offences officer within the meaning of subsection 1 (1) of the Provincial Offences Act may require an individual to provide the officer with the individual’s correct name, date of birth and address if the officer has reasonable and probable grounds to believe that the individual has committed an offence under subsection 10 (1) of the Reopening Ontario (A Flexible Response to COVID-19) Act, 2020. (2) Every individual who is required under subsection (1) to provide a provincial offences officer with their correct name, date of birth and address shall promptly comply. O. Reg. 114/20, Sched. 1; O. Reg. 422/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 500/20, s. 1.  Français
content.raw_html:
1. (1) A police officer or any other provincial offences officer within the meaning of subsection 1 (1) of the Provincial Offences Act may require an individual to provide the officer with the individual’s correct name, date of birth and address if the officer has reasonable and probable grounds to believe that the individual has committed an offence under subsection 10 (1) of the Reopening Ontario (A Flexible Response to COVID-19) Act, 2020.

(2) Every individual who is required under subsection (1) to provide a provincial offences officer with their correct name, date of birth and address shall promptly comply.

O. Reg. 114/20, Sched. 1; O. Reg. 422/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 500/20, s. 1.

 

Français
